######################################


#leader_trait_adaptable_2 #common trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_adaptable_2_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_adaptable_2
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_adaptable }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_adaptable_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_adaptable_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_adaptable_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

    potential = {

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes

        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }

    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = trait_ruler_fertility_preacher }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = trait_ruler_fertility_preacher_2 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_frontier_spirit } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_trait_ruler_frontier_spirit
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_trigger = yes
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = trait_ruler_frontier_spirit }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = trait_ruler_frontier_spirit }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_effect = yes }
    }

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes

        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }

    }

    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = trait_ruler_architectural_sense_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
        }
    }
}


#trait_ruler_deep_connections_3 #veteran trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_trait_ruler_deep_connections_3_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = trait_ruler_deep_connections_3 } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_trait_ruler_deep_connections_3
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = subclass_official_diplomacy_councilor }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = trait_ruler_deep_connections }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = trait_ruler_deep_connections_3 }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_trait_ruler_deep_connections_3_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = trait_ruler_deep_connections_3 }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_trait_ruler_deep_connections_3
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = trait_ruler_deep_connections_3 }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_trigger = yes

        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes

        }
    }

#leader_trait_educator #destiny trait
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_educator_add_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { NOT = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator } }
    }
    allow = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_add_official_leader_trait_educator
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_requires_ruler_subclass_or_focus_trigger = { CLASS = official ID = None }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_cost_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_points_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_skill_level_alt_2_trigger = yes
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_max_number_trigger = yes
        #has_paragon_dlc = no
    }
    effect = {
        #xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_remove_tier_1_or_2_traits_effect = { ID = leader_trait_educator }
        xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_pick_effect = { CLASS = official ID = leader_trait_educator }
        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
    }
}
xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_traits_official_leader_trait_educator_remove_button_effect = {
    potential = {
        ruler = { has_trait = leader_trait_educator }
    }
    allow = { always = yes }
    effect = {
        custom_tooltip = xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_tooltip_remove_official_leader_trait_educator
        hidden_effect = {
            ruler = { remove_trait = leader_trait_educator }
            xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_remove_alt_2_effect = yes
        }
    }
}

        hidden_effect = { xvcv_mdlc_core_modifying_trait_add_alt_2_effect = yes }
